page.title: 19Trimley Clubs and Recreation
page.content: These are the clubs we know about.They do not all meet in our block. For children there are two each of Scouts,Guides,Brownies,Cubs and Beavers (a new club for boys too young to join the Cubs). There are four pre- school playgroups and three youth clubs. Trimley Red Devils is a football club with teams which play in leagues for all ages of boys.There is a Watch Club for nature study and St.Mary's and the Methodist Churches have Sunday schools. The Trimley Tigers Cycle Speedway Club has a track on the Stennett Playing Field. Also on this field there is a football pitch and there are swings and a slide,etc.. For adults there are two Women's Institutes,a Mothers Union,an over 60's Club,a theatre group called the Saints Players and two pubs, one in our block called The Three Mariners.
